com.codemelon.graph.graph

Class VertexResetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codemelon.graph.graph.VertexResetter

  • public class VertexResetter
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods for resetting all vertices in a graph

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void resetColors(AbstractGraph<? extends ColoredVertex> graph)
      Reset the color of all vertices in the graph to white (typically signifies that the vertex has not yet been explored).
